subject: Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals
description_text:
Hello,

i bought your Pro X Ultra Pedals and the hydraulic rod from the gaspedal is broken, it is realy stiff at the end and its not very smooth, compared to the clutch one.

Can i get a new one?

Adress:

Adrian Kranzl
Hausleitnerweg 17,
4020 Linz
Austria


Best Regards

Adrian Kranzl

conversations.body_text: Hi Adrian. kranzl72,  No problem, we will send you a new throttle single-direction hydraulic rod on October 9th. This updated version has improved force performance. Please provide your order number, address, contact name, and phone number so we can arrange the shipment.

Hello,

i ordered it from alibaba, i hope this works to, i added two screenshots.

 This are my data:

Hausleitnerweg 17,
4020 Linz
Austria

Adrian Kranzl
+436605796281


Best Regards
Adrian

service@simsonn.com
Hi Adrian. kranzl72, You can temporarily remove the one-way hydraulic damper on the throttle so you can continue playing the game. I’ll send you a replacement one-way damper on October 9th.
Hi Adrian. kranzl72,  hello , Adrian  . Here is the tracking number :YT2528300702544175 , the shipping carrier YunExpress  . You can track it via https://www.yunexpress.com/.
